messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On July 15, DET. H. I. Watson was called to investigate a potential cyber attack at Redwood Tech Solutions. Key informants were Mr. Lee, the IT manager, and Ms. Martinez, the company CEO. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. J. K. Davis - OPERATIONS Det. Watson, Sr. .. INVESTIGATIONS. Detective L. M. Turner and Detective N. O. Jackson were brought in for technical analysis. DRAKE 16:25 Cyber Attack Mr. Lee noted suspicious server activity, while Ms. Martinez was concerned about client data. Server. Technician Alex retrieved system logs. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Watson Sr, Det. Turner, Det. Jackson OPERATIONS Lt. Davis INFORMANT Martinez, Maria 117 Redwood Road, Redwood, New York 177-710. 93595. DRAKE 16:25 Cyber Attack By 6:55 PM, Detectives Watson, Turner, and Jackson, under Lieutenant Davis' supervision, identified potential breach points. Captain P. Q. Reynolds initiated collaboration with federal agencies. Sergeant R. S. Lewis and Sergeant T. U. Vincent liaised with other tech companies for similar incidents. By 8:20 PM, the breach was contained, and an external actor was suspected. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Watson Sr, Det. Turner, Det. Jackson OPERATIONS Lt. Davis AFFIDAVIT - Cyber Attack Report 1) Server Activity Logs 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) Data Breach Details 5) Employee Access Logs (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE V. Parker R.T.S.P.D. 24.90 P58 2671 Lee, JAMES NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 150-2973 DETECTIVE: H. WATSON ITEM: 58-5150- 101 CRIME: 16:25 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 83300 - CONFIRMED Jane Doe DATE 1/15/24 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. H. I. Watson  Officer Context: On July 15, DET. H. I. Watson was called to investigate a potential cyber attack at Redwood Tech Solutions. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. J. K. Davis  Officer Context: Lt. J. K. Davis - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective L. M. Turner  Officer Context: Detective L. M. Turner and Detective N. O. Jackson were brought in for technical analysis. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective N. O. Jackson  Officer Context: Detective L. M. Turner and Detective N. O. Jackson were brought in for technical analysis. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Alex  Officer Context: Server. Technician Alex retrieved system logs. Officer Role: Technician Officer Name: Detective Watson  Officer Context: By 6:55 PM, Detectives Watson, Turner, and Jackson, under Lieutenant Davis' supervision, identified potential breach points. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Turner  Officer Context: By 6:55 PM, Detectives Watson, Turner, and Jackson, under Lieutenant Davis' supervision, identified potential breach points. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Jackson  Officer Context: By 6:55 PM, Detectives Watson, Turner, and Jackson, under Lieutenant Davis' supervision, identified potential breach points. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain P. Q. Reynolds  Officer Context: Captain P. Q. Reynolds initiated collaboration with federal agencies. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant R. S. Lewis  Officer Context: Sergeant R. S. Lewis and Sergeant T. U. Vincent liaised with other tech companies for similar incidents. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant T. U. Vincent Officer Context: Sergeant R. S. Lewis and Sergeant T. U. Vincent liaised with other tech companies for similar incidents. Officer Role: Sergeant
